text: Andipalayam is a census town in Tirupur district in the state of Tamil Nadu, India. ==Demographics== India census, Andipalayam had a population of 5471. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Andipalayam has an average literacy rate of 66%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 58% of the males and 42% of females literate. 11% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Neighbourhoods and suburbs of Tiruppur
title: Andipalayam (Tirupur)
